message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

The paper deals with computer vision and robotics, specifically loop closure detection, which is a common problem in robotics. The paper proposes a deep learning-based approach that combines appearance, semantic, and geometric information for robust and efficient loop closure detection. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves robotics and machine learning, which makes cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) likely categories as well. Additionally, the paper uses deep convolutional neural networks, which falls under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.MM (Multimedia).
